title: Alice in Borderland (2015)
description: Ryouhei Arisu is a high school student with no ambitions and just wants to escape from what he feels is a meaningless reality. One night when he is with his two friends Daikichi Karube and Chouta Segawa, they see an abnormally large firework shoot into the sky, an event which signals a permanent change in their lives.Blinded by the incredibly bright explosion, the three find themselves transported to what is known as the Borderland.
